title: The symmetric difference of two classes

blocks.name: csymdif
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for symmetric difference.
blocks.origin: prop class csymdif(class c0, class c1) { (c0 ∆ c1) }

blocks.name: diff.csymdif.s
diff.csymdif.c
diff.csymdif.w
df-symdif
blocks.content: Define the symmetric difference of two classes. Alternate definitions are ~ dfsymdif2 , ~ dfsymdif3 and ~ dfsymdif4 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: symdifcom
blocks.content: Symmetric difference commutes. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: symdifeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for symmetric difference. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: symdifeq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for symmetric difference. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: nfsymdif
blocks.content: Hypothesis builder for symmetric difference. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: elsymdif
blocks.content: Membership in a symmetric difference. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: dfsymdif4
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the symmetric difference. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.) (Revised by AV, 17-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: elsymdifxor
blocks.content: Membership in a symmetric difference is an exclusive-or relationship. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 26-Apr-2020.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 13-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: dfsymdif2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the symmetric difference. (Contributed by BJ, 30-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: symdifass
blocks.content: Symmetric difference is associative. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Apr-2012.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 7-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm symdifass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2), csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2), csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2))), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2))))
  elsymdifxor(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1), c2)
  3bitri(wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2))), wxo(wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  xorbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  elsymdifxor(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  biid(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  xorass(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  xorbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2)))
  biid(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  bicomi(wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2)))
  elsymdifxor(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  bicomi(wxo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2))))
  elsymdifxor(cv(hs0), c0, csymdif(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm symdifass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2)=(c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2), (c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)))
  3bitri(hs0 ∈((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2), hs0 ∈(c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1)⊻ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ⊻ hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2)))
  elsymdifxor(hs0, (c0 ∆ c1), c2)
  3bitri((hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1)⊻ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ⊻ hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ⊻ hs0 ∈ c1)⊻ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ⊻(hs0 ∈ c1 ⊻ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  xorbi12i(hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1), hs0 ∈ c2, (hs0 ∈ c0 ⊻ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c2)
  elsymdifxor(hs0, c0, c1)
  biid(hs0 ∈ c2)
  xorass(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  xorbi12i(hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ⊻ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2))
  biid(hs0 ∈ c0)
  bicomi((hs0 ∈ c1 ⊻ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2))
  elsymdifxor(hs0, c1, c2)
  bicomi((hs0 ∈ c0 ⊻ hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2)), hs0 ∈(c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)))
  elsymdifxor(hs0, c0, (c1 ∆ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)))
}

blocks.name: symdifassOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete proof of ~ symdifass as of 7-Sep-2022. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Apr-2012.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm symdifassOLD(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)), csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)), csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2)), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2)))), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  notbii(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  3bitr4i(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wb(wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  3bitr3ri(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wb(wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wn(wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  notbii(wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  biass(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  con1bii(wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  bitr4i(wn(wb(wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  xor3(wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  notbi(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  xor3(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  bibi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c1, c2)), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  elsymdif(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  bibi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  elsymdif(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  elsymdif(cv(hs0), c0, csymdif(c1, c2))
  elsymdif(cv(hs0), csymdif(c0, c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csymdif(c0, csymdif(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(csymdif(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm symdifassOLD(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2))=((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, (c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)), ((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2))
  3bitr4i(hs0 ∈(c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)), hs0 ∈((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2), ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2)), ¬(hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2))
  notbii((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2))
  3bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c2)), (¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2))
  3bitr3ri((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c2)), (¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), ¬((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  notbii(((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ↔(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  biass(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  con1bii(((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), (¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2))
  bitr4i(¬(¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ hs0 ∈ c2), (¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2))
  xor3(¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c2)
  notbi((hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c2)
  xor3(hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c2))
  bibi2i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1 ∆ c2), ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ↔ hs0 ∈ c2))
  elsymdif(hs0, c1, c2)
  bibi1i(hs0 ∈(c0 ∆ c1), hs0 ∈ c2, ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1))
  elsymdif(hs0, c0, c1)
  elsymdif(hs0, c0, (c1 ∆ c2))
  elsymdif(hs0, (c0 ∆ c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ∆(c1 ∆ c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 ∆ c1)∆ c2))
}

blocks.name: difsssymdif
blocks.content: The symmetric difference contains one of the differences. (Proposed by BJ, 18-Aug-2022.) (Contributed by AV, 19-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: difsymssdifssd
blocks.content: If the symmetric difference is contained in ` C ` , so is one of the differences. (Contributed by AV, 17-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: symdif2OLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ dfsymdif4 as of 18-Aug-2022. Two ways to express symmetric difference ( ~ df-symdif ). (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm symdif2OLD(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c1, c0)), cab(s0, wn(wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  abbi2i(s0, cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c1, c0)), wn(wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c1, c0))), wn(wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wo(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  eldif(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  eldif(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  elun(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c1, c0))
  xor(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.cun.s(s0, cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c1, c0))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, c0)
}
